title: Treasures of the Trust
brief_description: This superb video takes you on a tour of the paintings, antiques, furniture and gardens of some of Britain’s greatest and most famous homes, castles, and ruins…you’ll learn the history of the locations visited and tour the homes and grounds of National Trust sites. Places visited range from the breathtaking monastic remains of the 12th Century Fountains Abbey in Yorkshire, to the dramatic splendour of St. Michael’s Mount in Cornwall, including Tatton Park in Cheshire, Powis in Wales, Corfe Castle in Dorset, Kingston Lacy in Surrey and Chartwell in Kent.
